ovdesc.p: This table stores the result of the comparison between a matrix and the group.

desc.p: Defines the Y axis of the grid.
Validation Rules:

A multi-valued field associated with all the other fields in the file provides the details of a group position.

A sub-valued field that contains the maximum target percentage.
Validation Rules:
Defines the nature of each cell.
Depending on the nature of cell, rebalancing tool generates the proposed orders.
Blank: Rebalancing tool does not process this cell.
MOD: "Model" Rebalancing tool directly gets the security set of this cell. Assigned to cell which defines exactly the security.
RCD: "Recommendation" Rebalancing tool use recommended stock list to proposed orders. Assigned to cells which are securities with criteria (asset, currency, industry, sector and so on)
TGHT: "Through" Rebalancing tool use linked matrix to rebalance the group. NOT AVAILABLE
CCY: Rebalancing tool generate FX spot transactions for each cell defined as CCY.
PIVOT: Define the pivot currency when rebalancing generates FX spot orders.
HDG: Rebalancing tool generates FX forward transactions for each cell defined as HDG.
Validation Rules:
Holds the ID of the module that has a rise to this position.
